content.question: A person holds a 4.0 kg block at position A shown above on the left, in contact with an uncompressed vertical spring with a spring constant of 500 N/m. The person gently lowers the block from rest at position A to rest at position B. Which of the following describes the change in the energy of the block-spring-Earth system as a result of the block being lowered?

choices.label: The energy decreases by approximately 1.5 J.
The energy decreases by approximately 2.5 J.
The energy increases by approximately 4.0 J.
The energy of the system does not change.

content.answer: The energy decreases by approximately 1.5 J.
